title: Stoneweave on Beige Malachite - samples
description: plain weave or variation thereof, using a beige/lt. gold warp #19.  See individual pcs for indv info Beige & light olive warp. Yellow, lt green & white weft. Plain weave variation.Divided into two weft sections.Top half is yellow and lt green weft.  Bottom half is yellow and white weft. beige, lt olive, yellow, lt green, white)
